display_html: mkExponential :: forall {k} a b. CartesianClosed k => ((a :: k) ~> b) -> El (a ~~> b)
name: mkExponential

display_html: eval :: forall {k} a b. (CartesianClosed k, Ob a, Ob b) => (((a :: k) ~~> b) && a) ~> b
name: eval

data ExponentialFunctor a b where
  • ExponentialFunctor :: (Ob c, Ob d) => (a ~> (c ~~> d)) -> ExponentialFunctor a '(OP c, d)
name: ExponentialFunctor ExponentialFunctor

display_html:
data Bool
  • = False
  • | True
name: Bool True False

data Booleans a b where
  • Fls :: Booleans False False
  • F2T :: Booleans False True
  • Tru :: Booleans True True
name: Booleans Tru F2T Fls

class IsBool (b :: Bool) where
  • boolId :: b ~> b

name: Unweighted

class HasColimits (j :: PRO i a) k where
  • type Colimit (j :: PRO i a) (d :: PRO i k) :: PRO a k
  • colimit :: Corepresentable (d :: PRO i k) => Colimit j d :~> (j |> d)
  • colimitInv :: Corepresentable (d :: PRO i k) => (j |> d) :~> Colimit j d
name: HasColimits colimitInv colimit Colimit

data InitialLimit d a b where
  • InitialLimit :: forall d a. Ob a => (InitialObject ~> a) -> InitialLimit d U a
name: InitialLimit InitialLimit

display_html:
data CoproductColimit d a b where
  • CoproductColimit :: forall d b. Ob b => (((d %% L U) || (d %% R U)) ~> b) -> CoproductColimit d U b
name: CoproductColimit CoproductColimit

display_html: cochoose :: forall k (d :: PRO (COPRODUCT UNIT UNIT) k) b. (HasBinaryCoproducts k, Corepresentable d) => Obj b -> (d %% b) ~> ((d %% L U) || (d %% R U))
name: cochoose

class (Monoidal t, Ob m, CategoryOf k) => Monoid (t :: MONOIDAL k) (m :: k) where
  • mempty :: t '[] '[m]
  • mappend :: t '[m, m] '[m]
  • mconcat :: forall ms. Ob ms => All ((~) m) ms => t ms '[m]
name: Monoid mconcat mappend mempty

newtype AsMonoid p a b = AsMonoid {
  • getAsMonoid :: p a b
}

class (HasProducts j, HasProducts k, Functor f) => Applicative (f :: j -> k) where
  • pure :: El a -> El (f a)
  • liftA2 :: ((a && b) ~> c) -> (f a && f b) ~> f c
name: Applicative liftA2 pure

display_html:
class (HasCoproducts j, Applicative f) => Alternative (f :: j -> k) where
  • empty :: El (f a)
  • alt :: ((a || b) ~> c) -> (f a && f b) ~> f c
name: Alternative alt empty

data AsMonoid f a b where
  • AsMonoid :: forall f a b. Ob b => {..} -> AsMonoid f a b

class Profunctor p => Proapplicative p where
  • pureP :: Ob a => El b -> p a b
  • apP :: p a b -> p a c -> p a (b && c)
name: Proapplicative apP pureP

display_html:
class Proapplicative p => Proalternative p where
  • emptyP :: (Ob a, Ob b) => p a b
  • altP :: p a b -> p a b -> p a b
name: Proalternative altP emptyP

data Collage p a b where
  • InL :: (a ~> b) -> Collage p (L a) (L b)
  • InR :: (a ~> b) -> Collage p (R a) (R b)
  • L2R :: p a b -> Collage p (L a) (R b)
name: Collage L2R InR InL
